channel.title: Winops on plod.tv
channel.description: Recent content in Winops on plod.tv

item.title: WinOps 2018
item.description: As part of my job with DevOpsGroup I’ve been doing more and more work with my clients in the windows space, as a result I got the opportunity to attend WinOps 2018 last november. At #winops #London 2018 with #DevOpsGroup with my #Movember tash front and centre https://mobro.co/plod So what is WinOps? WinOps (a portmanteau of “Windows” and “DevOps”) is a term used referring to the cultural movement of DevOps practices for a Microsoft-centric view.
